general_web_dev.name: Timeline Widget
general_web_dev.desc: A timeline widget for embedding into a WordPress site. Created for the Carolina For The Kids Foundation to showcase the organization's history.

general_web_dev.name: Arithmetic Artillery
general_web_dev.desc: A 2-player game where players take turn solving each other's mathematic equations to figure out how far the enemy's ship will travel. Solving the equation allows the player to lead their shot more accurately.
general_web_dev.note: Online play functionality no longer works due to changes to Google Firebase architecture. Only for visual demonstration.

general_web_dev.name: Script UNC
general_web_dev.desc: A 2D top-down game that aims to teach the player basic principles of programming. The player moves the onscreen character by entering JavaScript functions and parameters into the provided editor.

general_web_dev.name: Mimic
general_web_dev.desc: A tool for mimicking iOS's iMessage user interface. Great for falsifying records and general tomfoolery.

general_web_dev.name: 2048 W98
general_web_dev.desc: A recreation of the popular game 2048 in the style of Windows 98. Experience pixel-perfect nostalgia.

general_web_dev.name: Network Simulator
general_web_dev.desc: A visualization of various network schemes. Created as part of a research project at UNC-CH.

general_web_dev.name: Rank UI
general_web_dev.desc: A user interface concept for ranking universities and other institutions worldwide. Created as part of a research project at UNC-CH.

general_web_dev.name: Dashboard UI
general_web_dev.desc: A user interface concept for lab technicians. Created as part of a research project at UNC-CH.

mobile_web_dev.name: Citizenship Guide
mobile_web_dev.desc: A WebKit native app designed for my Vietnamese mom to study for her US citizenship exam. Uses the Web Speech API to verbalize text questions in both English and Vietnamese. Happy to say this app did its job.

mobile_web_dev.name: Parcel Delivery
mobile_web_dev.desc: A user interface concept designed for a ride-share parcel delivery app. Created for a friend.

mobile_web_dev.name: Laser Queue
mobile_web_dev.desc: A digital queuing interface designed to be used as an iPad kiosk at BeAM makerspaces.

experimental_dev.name: Nixie 3D
experimental_dev.desc: Nixie tube clock screensaver. An experiment with CSS 3D on the web.

experimental_dev.name: Room 3D
experimental_dev.desc: Creepy room with texture and animation. An experiment with CSS 3D on the web.

experimental_dev.name: Keyboard Tanks
experimental_dev.desc: Like QWOP but with tanks. Use the keys WSED and IKOL to control the tracks of the tanks. Use QR and UP to rotate their turrets. Simultaneously press turret keys to fire. An experiment with CSS 3D in the web.

experimental_dev.name: Web Pod
experimental_dev.desc: An attempt to recreate the classic iPod's clickwheel using Hammer.js. Works best on a smartphone.

other.name: ACT Shirt
other.desc: Shirt design for the ACT Cohort club at Phillip O. Berry Academy of Technology.

other.name: Spiral Bound Key Art
other.desc: Key art design for Spiral Bound (2014), a documentary about a group of young education activists seeking social justice in the public school system through the arts.

other.name: App Contest 1
other.desc: MIT App Inventor project created as part of the Lenovo Scholar Network app challenge. Uses the CloudDB module to allow users to send virtual tokens to one another. Project was voted fan-favorite.

other.name: HOSA Shirt
other.desc: Shirt design for the HOSA club at Phillip O. Berry Academy of Technology.

other.name: POB Filter
other.desc: Snapchat filter for Phillip O. Berry Academy of Technology.

other.name: App Contest 2
other.desc: MIT App Inventor project created as part of the Lenovo Scholar Network app challenge. Uses the SMS and GPS modules to track and periodically notify others of the user's location in case of an emergency. Project was voted fan-favorite.

other.name: Old Well Filter
other.desc: Snapchat filter for the Old Well at UNC-CH.

other.name: Craige Filter
other.desc: Snapchat filter for the Craige Residence Hall at UNC-CH.

other.name: Bell Tower Isometric
other.desc: Isometric digital illustration of the Bell Tower at UNC-CH.

other.name: Bird Pendant
other.desc: Laser cut key chain featuring a painted carolina chickadee.

other.name: Makeathon Logo
other.desc: Logo designed for the Makeathon event at UNC-CH. Event hosted by the Kenan Flagler Business School.

other.name: Perpetual Calendar
other.desc: A flipping calendar concept that perpetually counts up as the casing is rotated.

other.name: Ladder Shelf
other.desc: A shelf in the style of a ladder. Project designed and planned in SketchUp.

other.name: Bedroom Bench
other.desc: A barn-style bedroom bench. Project designed and planned in SketchUp.

other.name: Feature Wall
other.desc: The feature wall in my bedroom. Project designed and planned in SketchUp.
